project-challenges: Programmatically coding and Leveraging Contextio 2.0 Connect_Token and Webhook to work with SMS protocalls.
project-inspiration:
I was wondering how to assist Companies, Hospitals, Schools, Social Networks, E-commerce Business
 to take proper care of their Customers by providing an immiediate responses to Issues and tickets sent to
their various Email Addresses. This has been achieved via Contextion Webhook Call and SMS Notifications Alerts System.
project-subtitle: Mail Alert Notifier with Advance Mail Answering Machine design to Scale in Multi-Tenant Systems
